citations.narrative:
On January 8, 2025, a USDA registered research facility bought 15 silver foxes from Mr. Krage. In a phone conversation
with the inspector, Mr. Krage confirmed that the research facility asked him to help them buy foxes for a study and that he
purchased the foxes from a breeder in Nebraska and then sold and delivered them to the research facility. Brokering the
sale of wild mammals like foxes to a USDA registered research facility is an activity that requires a valid license under the
Animal Welfare Act. A license must be obtained prior to conducting further regulated activity
An exit briefing was completed with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
On January 8, 2025, a USDA registered research facility bought 15 silver foxes from Mr. Krage. In a phone conversation 
with the inspector, Mr. Krage confirmed that the research facility asked him to help them buy foxes for a study and that he 
purchased the foxes from a breeder in Nebraska and then sold and delivered them to the research facility. Brokering the 
sale of wild mammals like foxes to a USDA registered research facility is an activity that requires a valid license under the 
Animal Welfare Act. A license must be obtained prior to conducting further regulated activity 
 
An exit briefing was completed with a facility representative.
